attributes.action: Defend UK Sovereignty. No return to EU Laws by this Labour government.
attributes.additional_details:
Yet today, we are deeply concerned by growing indications that the current government may be considering stealthy regulatory alignment, re-entry into EU schemes, or the slow reintroduction of EU law into British governance.


The people of the United Kingdom made their choice. It must not be ignored, diluted, or overturned through political maneuvering. Any attempt to tie the UK back into the EU’s legal orbit without consent from the British public is undemocratic and unacceptable.
attributes.background:
We demand the following:

•No reintroduction of EU laws or regulations without a new national referendum.

And

•Commitment to domestic lawmaking & the supremacy of UK courts in all matters affecting British citizens.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for similar action: 

Do not seek closer ties with the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710214
